${ModID}:Absorb.NAME: Absorb
${ModID}:Absorb.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain [E] equal to its ${ModID}:Weight.

${ModID}:AggroAura.NAME: Aggro Aura
${ModID}:AggroAura.DESCRIPTION: Attacks deal {@@}{!M!|0=0%|1=50%|2=100%|3=150%|4=200%|5=250%|6=300%|@=a lot} more damage if you have a debuff.
${ModID}:AggroAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Attacks deal {@@}{!M!|0=0%|1=50%|2=100%|3=150%|4=200%|5=250%|6=300%|@=a lot} more damage if you have a debuff.

${ModID}:Backpacking.NAME: Backpacking
${ModID}:Backpacking.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Blaster.NAME: Blaster
${ModID}:Blaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade !M! random card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Backswing.NAME: Backswing
${ModID}:Backswing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${ModID}:Backswing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:BodyPress.NAME: Body Press
${ModID}:BodyPress.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal damage equal to your Block.

${ModID}:BuckleUp.NAME: Buckle Up
${ModID}:BuckleUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Throw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:ChainShock.NAME: Chain Shock
${ModID}:ChainShock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.

${ModID}:Cheat.NAME: Cheat
${ModID}:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card that costs 1 or more. NL It costs 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CloseCombat.NAME: Close Combat
${ModID}:CloseCombat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 Weak.

${ModID}:Compress.NAME: Compress
${ModID}:Compress.DESCRIPTION: Increase the ${ModID}:Weight of ALL your cards by X{@@}{!M!|>0=+!M!}.

${ModID}:CounterCurse.NAME: Counter Curse
${ModID}:CounterCurse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive Weak or Vulnerable, apply !M! of that debuff to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:CrushingBlow.NAME: Crushing Blow
${ModID}:CrushingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Vulnerable equal to this card's ${ModID}:Weight.

${ModID}:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
${ModID}:CursedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you receive a debuff, increase this card's damage by !M! ths combat.

${ModID}:DartThrow.NAME: Dart Throw
${ModID}:DartThrow.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DireStrike.NAME: Dire Strike
${ModID}:DireStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have a debuff, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

${ModID}:DragonPiercer.NAME: Dragon Piercer
${ModID}:DragonPiercer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DrainPunch.NAME: Drain Punch
${ModID}:DrainPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:ExNihilo.NAME: Ex Nihilo
${ModID}:ExNihilo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:FiftyTwoPickup.NAME: 52 Pickup
${ModID}:FiftyTwoPickup.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Throw your draw pile.{@@}{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !${ModID}:I! damage.)} NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FinishingTouch.NAME: Finishing Touch
${ModID}:FinishingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat.

${ModID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${ModID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Fireworks.NAME: Fireworks
${ModID}:Fireworks.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, watch !M! fireworks.

${ModID}:Flamethrower.NAME: Flamethrower
${ModID}:Flamethrower.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Flare.NAME: Flare
${ModID}:Flare.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Float.NAME: Float
${ModID}:Float.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage from Attacks for !M! turns.

${ModID}:FormalComplaint.NAME: Formal Complaint
${ModID}:FormalComplaint.DESCRIPTION: Remove your Weak and Vulnerable. NL Apply them to the enemy.

${ModID}:GalahadsShield.NAME: Galahad's Shield
${ModID}:GalahadsShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you Upgrade a Defend, Upgrade this.

${ModID}:Grapple.NAME: Grapple
${ModID}:Grapple.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Guillotine.NAME: Guillotine
${ModID}:Guillotine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Minions have their HP set to 0.

${ModID}:HeadHunter.NAME: Head Hunter
${ModID}:HeadHunter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL For each enemy this kills, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

${ModID}:HeavyMetal.NAME: Heavy Metal
${ModID}:HeavyMetal.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! *Plating into your hand.
${ModID}:HeavyMetal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add !M! *Plating into your hand.

${ModID}:HeavySlam.NAME: Heavy Slam
${ModID}:HeavySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the total ${ModID}:Weight of your held cards{@@}{!M!|>0= +!M!}.

${ModID}:HerosShield.NAME: Hero's Shield
${ModID}:HerosShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade !M! random card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:HoldTheLine.NAME: Hold the Line
${ModID}:HoldTheLine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 0, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:IronHead.NAME: Iron Head
${ModID}:IronHead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Plating into your hand.

${ModID}:Jab.NAME: Jab
${ModID}:Jab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has a debuff, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Jettison.NAME: Jettison
${ModID}:Jettison.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Throw your hand, then draw that many cards.{@@}{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !${ModID}:I! damage.)} NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Jettison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Throw your hand, then draw that many cards.{@@}{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !${ModID}:I! damage.)}

${ModID}:Manifest.NAME: Manifest
${ModID}:Manifest.DESCRIPTION: Add *Plating into your hand until it is full. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MassDriver.NAME: Mass Driver
${ModID}:MassDriver.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times this card's ${ModID}:Weight.

${ModID}:MuscleThrough.NAME: Muscle Through
${ModID}:MuscleThrough.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have a debuff, gain !M! additional Block.

${ModID}:NoblesseOblige.NAME: Noblesse Oblige
${ModID}:NoblesseOblige.DESCRIPTION: Increase the ${ModID}:Weight of all cards in your hand by !M! for the rest of combat. NL Gain 1 Weak.

${ModID}:Opener.NAME: Opener
${ModID}:Opener.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next {@@}{!M!|>1=!M! }Attack{!M!|>1=s} you play cost{!M!|1=s} 0.

${ModID}:Overexert.NAME: Overexert
${ModID}:Overexert.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 2 Weak. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PowerSurge.NAME: Power Surge
${ModID}:PowerSurge.DESCRIPTION: Gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} . NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:Pulse.NAME: Pulse
${ModID}:Pulse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Rally.NAME: Rally
${ModID}:Rally.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

${ModID}:RandomBullshitGo.NAME: Random Bullshit Go
${ModID}:RandomBullshitGo.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to ${ModID}:Throw !M! times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
${ModID}:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Add a number of *Plating into your hand equal to its ${ModID}:Weight.

${ModID}:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
${ModID}:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage if you have a debuff.

${ModID}:Shelter.NAME: Shelter
${ModID}:Shelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove !M! of your debuffs.

${ModID}:ShockingGrasp.NAME: Shocking Grasp
${ModID}:ShockingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, the enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:SkillIssue.NAME: Skill Issue
${ModID}:SkillIssue.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Throw all Skills in your hand. NL Gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !${ModID}:I! damage.)}

${ModID}:SliceAndDice.NAME: Slice and Dice
${ModID}:SliceAndDice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card in your hand.

${ModID}:SolidForm.NAME: Solid Form
${ModID}:SolidForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, deal damage to a random enemy equal to your leftover Block{@@}{!M!|>1= !M! times}.
${ModID}:SolidForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, deal damage to a random enemy equal to your leftover Block{@@}{!M!|>1= !M! times}.

${ModID}:TakeDown.NAME: Take Down
${ModID}:TakeDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have discarded a card this turn, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

${ModID}:Torment.NAME: Torment
${ModID}:Torment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each unique debuff on the enemy.

${ModID}:Trounce.NAME: Trounce
${ModID}:Trounce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt

${ModID}:WeaponsReady.NAME: Weapons Ready
${ModID}:WeaponsReady.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack that costs X or less. NL Play it twice and exhaust it. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:WeaponsReady.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack that costs X or less. NL Play it twice and exhaust it.

${ModID}:WeightedDraw.NAME: Weighted Draw
${ModID}:WeightedDraw.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Increase their ${ModID}:Weight by !M!.

${ModID}:WideGuard.NAME: Wide Guard
${ModID}:WideGuard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block from a card, also gain !M! Block next turn.
